synopsis.text: Known as the 'Rainbow Bullet' and hailing from a humble background, Eve is a golf prodigy who uses her extraordinary skills to wager and win against her opponents, earning a living in the world of underground golf. On the other hand, Aoi Amawashi, the 'Innocent Tyrant', is the privileged daughter of a wealthy entrepreneur, who effortlessly crushes her adversaries with a radiant smile, driven by her pure love for the sport. When these two geniuses from contrasting worlds serendipitously cross paths in the country of Nafrece, their lives become intertwined in ways they never could have anticipated. As they challenge and inspire each other, Eve and Aoi's rivalry promises to take the world of golf to new heights, shaking up the status quo with their unique playstyles and unyielding determination to emerge victorious. Prepare to witness an exhilarating showdown between these two young women golfers, as their dreams of turning professional fuel an intense competition that will leave spectators on the edge of their seats.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
